Package org.jmc

Interface Summary
ChunkLoaderThread Chunk loader interface.
 

Class Summary
Chunk Class describing a chunk.
Colors Color class
FullChunkLoaderThread Chunk loader that loads all the chunks for the chosen save.
LevelDat Class used for loading the level.dat file from the world save.
MainPanel Main Panel containing all the content of the window.
MainWindow MainWindow class.
MemoryMonitor Memory monitor panel and thread.
MTLFile Material file class.
OBJExportThread A thread used and UI for saving an OBJ file.
OBJFile OBJ file class.
PreviewPanel Panel used for displaying the preview of the map.
Region Region file class.
ViewChunkLoaderThread Chunk loader that loads only the chunks visible on the screen and removes the chunks that go off screen.
 

Enum Summary
MTLFile.Side A small enum for describing the sides of a cube.
OBJFile.MeshType Small enum describing the mesh types.
OBJFile.TexCoordinate Small enum describing the UV location of the texture for simple rectangular textures.
